name: Best Friend Doggie Biscuits
author: Allie G.
summary: This is a dog biscuit recipe my Pembroke Corgi loves to eat again and again! For more fun, use cookie cutters with shapes like cats, fire hydrants, shoes, or bones.
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
In a large bowl, combine cornmeal, flour, and salt
In a separate bowl, beat the egg together with the oil
Stir in the chicken broth and parsley
Gradually add the egg mixture to the flour mixture, stirring to combine and make a soft dough
Working on a lightly floured surface, lightly knead dough
Roll out to a thickness of 1/2 inch
Cut into desired shapes with cookie cutters
Place cookies one inch apart on the prepared cookie sheet
Bake in preheated oven for 15 minutes or until firm
